text: Good Friday morning to you! How are you today?
Hello, I am fine, how about you?
I am doing really well. I am a little surprised at how cold it is here this morning-it's only in the 50's, which I was not expecting. How is it by you?
It is warm here. Are you interested in donating?
Interesting. I was going to ask you if you had heard about the organization Save the Children. Are you interested in donating even $0.05 of today's pay to help the kids?
I am very interested in donating, I have a soft heart for children and I will donate as much as possible
Well that is really great. What is the amount you would like to pledge from today's payment?
I guess i will help $1, is this an international charity?
That would be a great help to the children! Thank you! Yes this is a charity that not only helps outside of the US but also inside. Have you heard about the storms/flooding in Hawaii?
I have not heard. in how many countries do they work? and which issues they work on mainly?

STC works to provide kids with the basic things that they need like food, healthcare and shelter issues. I know as soon as the floods hit Hawaii STC pledged to help out.  The US based center is in CT. Are you interested in more info?
Yes I am. I will donate today but is it possible I donate later too?
Yes, you can donate any time. I have you down for $1 for today, right?
okay don't worry I will donate. I just want to know more about it. is there any big company cooperating with them?
I can give you their website. It is  URL let me know if the link comes through.
okay I will explore it, thank you. I like to know more
Well, from what I read, close to 90% of the money that they collect goes directly to the kids. I know that makes me feel really good. How about you?.
It makes me feel good too. I like it if they are so clear with their financial reports
Yes. Did you see that they also give the chance to sign up and sponsor individual kids? Also, thank you for your $ donation!
Yes I've seen it and there are many big companies working with them, like IKEA and Disney
